tag_list: entrepreneurship, technology, web, mobile-applications, consulting, marketing-strategy, innovative-business-model, sales-operations
overview:
Raphael Dana is a serial entrepreneur passionate about media, technology and innovative business ventures. With a large experience in web development, mass media publishing and PR strategy, he has initiated a series of entrepreneurial projects in Switzerland, the US and the UK and is now setting foot in Asia. Currently GALIXO’s CEO, Raphael has been defining its unique business model as a global consulting strategy company dedicated to the app business.

In 1995, Raphael co-founded NetArchitects, a pioneering web development company based in Geneva with some of the leading top 500 Fortune accounts as clients and sold in 2002 to Altran Technologies (www.altran.com), In 2003, Raphael co-founded a niche media group focused on business & financial publishing (www.market.ch) as well as high net worth luxury publications (www.surlaterre.com) with a unique cosmopolitan concept and targeted distribution in over 20 cities in the world. In 2011, Raphael decided to go back to the Tech Industry to create GALIXO where he merges his passion for entrepreneurship and technology with his talent for pioneering business models and marketing strategy.

Raphael founded the Entrepreneur’s Organization Geneva chapter (www.eo.org) for which he has been its first president and has lectured in several universities about entrepreneurship.
